visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series. Additional configurations include setting chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the title is styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 18px. The x-axis represents months with categories from January to December, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. Both axes have labels and titles styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 12px and 14px, respectively. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes monthly temperature data, with a custom color of tomato red (#FF6347). The chart has custom margins and a light gray background. The legend is enabled and styled with a medium gray color and a font size of 12px.
